author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/48903

#### PR description:

Development of HLT menus for `CMSSW_15_0_X`:
   * This is the PR for the `CMSSW_15_0_X` branch, this is the release cycle currently used for Run-3 HLT-menu development.
  * These updates correspond to the changes accumulated after the "V1.3" (last) GRun menu was delivered. 
   * **This is the close-out development PR in the `CMSSW_15_0_X` cycle**

This update includes the integration of the following JIRA tickets:
- [CMSHLT-3625](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3625) [EXO] Update of `HLT_L1AXOVV*Tight_v` prescales (Run2024E)
- [CMSHLT-3631](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3631) [E/gamma] Silence e/gamma seeding related framework warnings

In addition this PR introduces the following commits:
- 9bfbe4988a7f54e78ab71946fefd9fc18b4963b2:  update the era and input file used in the `addOnTestsHLT.py` and `cmsDriver.sh`
    - use `Run3_2025` and a file from 2025D
    - update list of input files in `testAccessToEDMInputsOfHLTTests_filelist.txt`
- 206a9d3fb6b57c59fa1f7ae0855f6331024783e9:  fix `HLTrigger/Configuration/python/Tools/confdb.py`
    - due to splitting of `ScoutingPF` dataset in #48719
    - re-derive offline dumps to remove `GlobalEvFOutputModule` (see issue #48901)

#### PR validation:

TSG Integration tests
In addition I run the following command:

```
#!/bin/bash -ex

cmsDriver.py step2 -s DIGI:pdigi_valid,L1,DIGI2RAW,HLT:@relval2025 --conditions auto:phase1_2025_realistic --datatier GEN-SIM-DIGI-RAW -n 10 --eventcontent FEVTDEBUGHLT --geometry DB:Extended --era Run3_2025 --io Digi_2025.io --python Digi_2025.py --no_exec --filein file:step1.root --fileout file:step2.root
```

to test issue #48901 gets fixed.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/48903 to CMSSW_15_0_X for 2025 data-taking purposes.
title: HLT menu development for `15_0_X` (10/N)
